_comment: TEMPLATE: Update name and version when creating new apps from this template
name: app-template

scripts.ios:clean-build: npx expo prebuild --platform ios --clean && npx expo run:ios --device --configuration Release
scripts.sim: npx expo prebuild --clean && npx expo run:ios
scripts.sim:release: npx expo prebuild --clean && npx expo run:ios --configuration Release
scripts.device: npx expo prebuild --clean && npx expo run:ios --device
scripts.device:release: npx expo prebuild --clean && npx expo run:ios --device --configuration Release --non-interactive
scripts.sim:android: npx expo prebuild --clean && npx expo run:android
scripts.sim:android:release: npx expo prebuild --clean && npx expo run:android --variant release
scripts.device:android: npx expo prebuild --clean && npx expo run:android --device
scripts.device:android:release: npx expo prebuild --clean && npx expo run:android --device --variant release
scripts.release:build: npm run validate-config && npx expo prebuild --clean && npm install && eas build --platform ios --local --profile production --non-interactive
scripts.screenshots: echo 'ðŸ“¸ See instructions with: npm run demo:help'
scripts.validate: npm run validate-config && npm run sync-config
scripts.prebuild: npm run validate-config && npm run sync-config
